03: C
```{r}
Age <- c(22, 25, 18, 20)
Name <- c("James", "Mathew", "Olivia", "Stella")
Gender <- c("M", "M", "F", "F")

DataFrame <- data.frame(Age, Name, Gender)
subset(DataFrame, Gender=="M")
```

05: D

 (x+2)[(!is.na(x)) & x > 0] -> k
